item.title: 100个问题
item.description: 100个问题 # 1. What is a skill you have that most people don’t acknowledge? 2. How would your best friend describe you? 3. What is the first complex problem you can remember solving as a kid? 4. What’s your least favorite time of day and why? 5. Do you work better as an individual or as part of a team? 6. Do you prefer working in an office setting or remotely?
